=== Core library ===

==== Array ====
{{{class="ruby"
# Reject items
  ["", "1", "2"].reject(&:empty?)

# Select items
  [0, 1, 2].select { |item| item >= 1 }

# Check items against condition
  [1, 2, 3].any? { |item| item > 1 }
}}}

==== Goodies ====

===== Benchmark =====
{{{class="ruby"
require "benchmark"

puts Benchmark.measure { "something".capitalize }

Benchmark.bm do |bm|
  bm.report "message here" do
    1_000.times do
      "something".capitalize
    end
  end
end
}}}
